fields.name: AccessControl
fields.description: Access control for live event input.

fields.name: AccessToken
fields.description: A UUID in string form to uniquely identify the stream. This can be specified at creation time but cannot be updated. If omitted, the service will generate a unique value.

fields.name: Endpoints
fields.description: The input endpoints for the live event.

fields.name: KeyFrameIntervalDuration
fields.description: ISO 8601 time duration of the key frame interval duration of the input. This value sets the EXT-X-TARGETDURATION property in the HLS output. For example, use PT2S to indicate 2 seconds. Leave the value empty for encoding live events.

fields.name: StreamingProtocol
fields.description: The input protocol for the live event. This is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.
